Learning_TopicObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Learning_TopicObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Learning_TopicObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Identifies topics using unique references for updates. Leave blank when adding topics. For update, the ID corresponds to topic name.

validation.validation: The learning topic name must be unique.

Learning_Topic_Data.description: Indicates whether the topic is inactive.

IconObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

IconObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

IconObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Learning_Topic_Data.description: Reference instance for the icon associated with the topic.

ImageObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

ImageObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

ImageObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Learning_Image_Data.description: Contains reference to an image instance for the cover image

Learning_Image_Attachment_Data.description: Text attribute identifying a unique ID for Attachment.
Text attribute that identifies the filename of the attachment.
Text attribute identifying Content Type of the Attachment.

Learning_Image_Data.description: Contains data to upload an image instance for the cover image

validation.validation: Content Type not supported. An image is required.

Workdrive_Document_ContentObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Workdrive_Document_ContentObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Workdrive_Document_ContentObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Learning_Image_Data.description: Contains reference to a Workdrive document for cover image.

Learning_Topic_Data.description: Reference instance for the image associated with the topic.

validation.validation: You can only add a file from Drive as the cover image for learning content if you're the owner of the file or it's shared with you.
Content Type not supported. An image is required.

description: Contains detailed information about a topic.

validation.validation: Enter a topic name that’s less than or equal to 50 characters.
You can only add 1 image per topic.
You need to select or upload 1 image for the topic.
